Package xxl.core.collections.queues

The package xxl.core.collections.queues provides miscellaneous implementations of the queue datastructure.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FIFOQueue<E>
    The interface FIFO queue represents a FIFO (first in, first out) iteration over a collection of elements (also known as a sequence) with a peek method.
    LIFOQueue<E>
    The interface LIFO queue represents a LIFO (last in, first out) iteration over a collection of elements (also known as a sequence) with a peek method.
    MemoryManageableQueue<E>  
    Queue<E>
    The interface queue represents an user specified iteration over a collection of elements (also known as a sequence) with a peek method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMemoryManageableQueue<E>  
    AbstractQueue<E>
    This class provides a skeletal implementation of the Queue interface, to minimize the effort required to implement this interface.
    ArrayQueue<E>
    This class provides a resizable-array implementation of the Queue interface with a FIFO (first in, first out) strategy.
    BoundedQueue<E>
    Decorates an arbitrary queue by adding boundary conditions.
    DecoratorQueue<E>
    This class provides a decorator for a queue that follows the Decorator Design Pattern (for further details see Structural Patterns, Decorator in Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software by Erich Gamma, Richard Helm, Ralph Johnson, and John Vlissides).
    DistinctQueue<E>
    This class provides a wrapper for a queue that performes a simple duplicate elimination.
    DynamicHeap<E>
    This class provides a dynamical resizable-array implementation of the heap datastructure.
    Heap<E>
    This class provides the heap datastructure.
    ListQueue<E>
    This class provides an implementation of the Queue interface with a FIFO (first in, first out) strategy that internally uses a list to store its elements.
    MemoryManageableListQueue<E>  
    Queues
    This class contains various static methods for manipulating queues.
    StackQueue<E>
    This class provides an implementation of the Queue interface with a LIFO (last in, first out) strategy that internally uses a stack to store its elements.
    ThreadsafeQueue<E>
    A ThreadsafeQueue can be used by different threads that use this queue for communicating with each other.
    UnmodifiableQueue<E>
    This class provides a decorator for a given queue that cannot be modified.

Package xxl.core.collections.queues Description

The package xxl.core.collections.queues provides miscellaneous implementations of the queue datastructure. It contains a bounded queue (BoundedQueue), queues using inserting strategies like LIFO ( StackQueue) and FIFO ( ListQueue), queues using special data structures for internal storing (for instance ArrayQueue), heaps ( Heap) and even a threadsafe queue ( ThreadsafeQueue).
